fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Budget, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations
eu_initiatives:
EU policy and practice relating to peacebuilding, including: 
 
THEMATIC: 
- Common Foreign and Security Policy, including Common Security and Defence Policy 
- Development 
- European Neighbourhood Policy  
- EU Budget 
- External funding instruments  
- Gender (UNSCR 1325) 
- Engaging armed groups  
 
GEOGRAPHIC: 
- Africa (East and Central Africa, West Africa) 
- Former SU (South Caucasus) 
- Asia (The Philippines, India/Pakistan/Kashmir) 
- Pacific (Fiji and Bougainville) 
- South America (Colombia) 
- Global (UN)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
We are active members of the European Peacebuilding Liasion Office (EPLO). EPLO is the platform of European NGOs, networks of NGOs and think tanks active in the field of peacebuilding, who share an interest in promoting sustainable peacebuilding policies among decision-makers in the European Union. www.eplo.org 
 
Other network memberships: 
- Alliance for Peacebuilding 
- BOND  
- Gender Action for Peace & Security (GAPS) UK 
- Mediation Support Network (MSN)
goals__remit: Conciliation Resources is an independent organisation working with people in conflict to prevent violence and build peace. We provide advice, support and practical resources to help divided communities resolve their differences peacefully. In addition, we take what we learn to government decision-makers and others working to end conflict, to improve peacebuilding policies and practice worldwide.
legal_status: charity and company limited by guarantee
